trends: There have been 36 other sightings in Tempe
There were no other sightings in Tempe on or around September 26th 2006
divs: Sighting DetailsIt was about 2pm in the afternoon. I was on a lunch break from work. The first day I saw four of the objects and the second day I saw three. They either hovered or moved across the sky. The hovering ones hovered over the exact same spot two days in a row..then would move across the sky or just vanish. Location was just slightly east and north of Phoenix Sky Harbor Airport. I saw several of these objects 2.5 years ago as well.
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
Summary: bright white spheres ..size and altitude unknown
